bug.summary: Inherit from Callback throws missing Trainer argument
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>üêõ Bug</denchmark-h>
The PL 1.0.x update has removed the trainer argument from TrainerCallbackHookMixin when calling e.g. callback.on_init_start(self). However, Callback has not been updated for this change. This results in a missing argument trainer.
TrainerCallbackHookMixin link: https://github.com/PyTorchLightning/pytorch-lightning/blob/master/pytorch_lightning/trainer/callback_hook.py#L42 Callback link: https://github.com/PyTorchLightning/pytorch-lightning/blob/master/pytorch_lightning/callbacks/base.py#L38
<denchmark-h:h2>Please reproduce using the BoringModel and post here</denchmark-h>
BoringModel colab: <denchmark-link:https://colab.research.google.com/drive/1i38oUFbnkgmgamMk6Jc4zpc9BrF31ZfE?usp=sharing>https://colab.research.google.com/drive/1i38oUFbnkgmgamMk6Jc4zpc9BrF31ZfE?usp=sharing</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h3>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
BoringModel <denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
Not throw an error when using class MyPrintingCallback(Callback) <denchmark-h:h3>Actual behavior</denchmark-h>
TypeError Traceback (most recent call last)

3 frames
